text: Uavɨla 8.15-16 Mt 28.19, HJL 2.38, 10.47-48, 19.1-2 Samalia fɨli tɨbɨ iahua igavɨci hulaŋ iamɨgali avɨli hɨvɨ mɨŋamɨgu mɨŋaiahami agɨlaŋ nulɨdɨ Hekɨlɨ Jisasɨ saŋ pam hɨji vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ lamavɨmi. Avɨli hɨvɨ mɨŋamɨgu mɨŋaiahami ala Asɨ dɨ Amɨŋ agaŋ nɨbɨlaŋ hula ma hɨnimi. Lɨci Pita hula Jon hula Asɨ dɨ nameŋ abavɨmi. Nadɨ Amɨŋ agaŋ ve nɨbɨlaŋ hula hɨnim uavɨmi.
